Comments_List: Journaling, workshopping, writing about topics in a non-biased yet still personal way.
I developed the ability to write about deeply personal topics and experiences that I didn't always relate to at first but found connections in.
Prof Hopper was the absolute best

This course was amazing in that the professor gave us so much time and provided so much freedom and diversity of topic for papers, readings, and discussions. The one weakness was that we didn't discuss rhetoric as much as one may have in English 120, but that also had an upside as we were able to discuss broader essay tactics.
Yes! too bad Professor Hopper is leaving...
I would rec this!! Anything that Dr. Hopper teaches is brilliant and she is a professor to remember.
